title: Is it possible to use a late add pass on classes that are already full?

I know some professors will allow you to manually enroll if they give you a permission number or override your enrollment request in Ares, but how would I actually go about doing so through MyUCLA since it won’t let me select the course unless there’s open seats?  Is it still possible to use a late add pass even though the seats are filled? If not, what other options am I left with?   Thanks!

title: I have to get off my meds and I'm going through a bad withdrawal
self_text: I am taking Abilify, but it's messing with my metabolism so I need to come off of it. This is a long process and I'm getting severe side effects like panic attacks, insomnia, and loss of appetite. The only thing that helps me calm down is watching movies, but they can also be triggering because of the imagery. Does anyone know what movie or TV show might be good for someone who is dealing with mental health issues?   I tried Stranger Things and Black Mirror, but both were too scary for me.  Maybe something funny or lighthearted?

title: How do you deal with people who are always asking to copy your notes?
self_text: I have a lot of friends in my classes and they’re always asking me if I can share my notes, which is fine but sometimes it feels like they just want to leech off me for all the work that goes into taking good notes. Like, I don't mind helping when someone misses a class or something but I feel like there's an expectation that I'll share them regardless. It's especially annoying when they ask right before the exam so they can cram.

title: I need to drop out of a class and can't do it in my portal...

title: Is anyone else getting a weird sense of deja vu from the school?
